articles.headline: The Real Owner of All Those Planes
articles.snippet: Steven Udvar-Hazy is a pioneer in airplane leasing, owning more airplanes than any airline in the world.
articles.abstract: Steven Udvar-Hazy is a pioneer in airplane leasing, owning more airplanes than any airline in the world.
articles.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — When Steven Udvar-Hazy was a teenager in New York City, he would often head after school to Idlewild Airport, as Kennedy International was known then, to watch planes take off and land.

articles.headline: A BlackBerry for Collars of All Colors
articles.snippet: The Curve can transmit music from your pocket, wirelessly, to a pair of lightweight Bluetooth headphones.
articles.abstract: The Curve can transmit music from your pocket, wirelessly, to a pair of lightweight Bluetooth headphones.
articles.lead_paragraph: As a human being, you’re pretty much stuck with the features you had on the date of manufacture. Very few adults ever become substantially taller, faster or more artistic.

articles.headline: Prominent in Hong Kong and, Perhaps, in the Dow Jones Inquiry
articles.snippet: David K. P. Li, an aristocratic banker in Hong Kong, is expected to be questioned about a possible insider-trading case involving shares of Dow Jones.
articles.abstract: David K. P. Li, an aristocratic banker in Hong Kong, is expected to be questioned about a possible insider-trading case involving shares of Dow Jones.
articles.lead_paragraph: HONG KONG, May 9 — Like David Rockefeller in the United States and a succession of Rothschilds in Europe, David K. P. Li has long received the accolades that come to aristocratic bankers who combine wealth, political influence and public service.

articles.headline: Fed Gives No Signal of Rate Shift
articles.snippet: The Fed acknowledged that the economy was slowing, but offered little hint that it was ready to lower interest rates.
articles.abstract: The Fed acknowledged that the economy was slowing, but offered little hint that it was ready to lower interest rates.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 9 — The Federal Reserve acknowledged Wednesday that the economy was slowing, but offered little hint that it was ready to lower interest rates anytime soon.

articles.headline: Chief Agrees to Resign From HBO After Arrest
articles.snippet: Chris Albrecht resigned at Time Warner’s request, after he was arrested and charged with assaulting a girlfriend.
articles.abstract: Chris Albrecht resigned at Time Warner’s request, after he was arrested and charged with assaulting a girlfriend.
articles.lead_paragraph: Time Warner announced last night that the chairman and chief executive of its Home Box Office unit, Chris Albrecht, had agreed to resign at the company’s request, three days after he was arrested and charged with assaulting a girlfriend in a Las Vegas parking lot.
